text: The 2016 Karnataka State Film Awards, presented by Government of Karnataka, felicitated the best of Karnataka cinema released in the year 2016.Karnataka State Film Award Winners for 2016 The list of winners were announced on 11 April 2017.2016 Karnataka State Awards List To Be Announced On Tuesday The awards were presented on 24 April. ==Lifetime achievement award== The jury committee for selecting the lifetime achievement awards was headed by actress Jayanthi. {|class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !style="background- color:#EFE4B0;"|Name of Award !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Awardee(s) !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Awarded As !style="background- color:#EFE4B0;"|Awards |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Dr. Rajkumar Award Puttanna Kanagal Award Dr. Vishnuvardhan Award |Advani Lakshmi Devi K. V. Raju K. Chinnappa |Actress Director Poster artist |₹ 2,00,000 & Gold Medal with a certificate ₹ 2,00,000 & Gold Medal with a certificate ₹ 2,00,000 & Gold Medal with a certificate |} == Jury == A committee headed by director Kavitha Lankesh was appointed to evaluate the awards. Other jury members were actress Rekha Rao, cinematographer Basavaraj, Director KN Vaidyanath and singer Chandrika Gururaj. == Film Awards == {|class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Name of Award !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Film !style="background- color:#EFE4B0;"|Producer !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Director |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |First Best Film |Amaravathi |Sushma.
